name: VOA educação
description: VOA Educação helps educators to monitor socio-emotional development in students. The EdTech was acquired by Vivadí in Nov 2021 in a bet on consolidation of the Brazilian soft skills market.

name: Essenvia
description: Essenvia is the leading platform to accelerate MedTech regulatory submissions in clearance of FDA 510(k) and EU MDR & IVDR CE certifications. The company raised a $4M pre-A round in May 2023.
